word:
"Our enemies may triumph. They may speak lying words, and their tongue frame slander, deceit and falsehood, yet will we not be moved. We know in whom we have believed. We have not run in vain, neither labored in vain. A reckoning day is coming, and all will be judged according to the deeds done in the body. It is true the world is dark. Opposition may wax strong. The trifler and scorner 
                                                                           201
may grow bold in their iniquity, yet for all this we will not be moved, but lean upon the arm of the Mighty One for strength.
